Hawkins Parnell Thackston & Young LLP, Atlanta, GA
Legal Intern, May 2013-August 2013
Conducted legal research and prepared memoranda regarding a variety of civil cases.
Drafted a variety of legal documents, including: discovery requests and responses,
complaints, various motions, and correspondence to clients and opposing counsel.
Assisted with a large-scale document review and production to opposing counsel.
Assisted with trial, hearing, and deposition preparation, including: organizing and preparing
exhibits, fact-finding, and document review.
Hawkins Parnell Thackston & Young LLP, Atlanta, GA

Assisted attorneys with deposition, hearing, and trial preparation for various business
litigation matters.

matters.
Created and maintained a large document database for a team of eleven Partners and
Associates.
Assisted with large-scale audits of Associate, Partner and Paralegal billable hours.
Performed various administrative tasks, including: proofreading pleadings, letters, and
written correspondence; organizing important legal documents; assisting with large-scale
printing and scanning projects.
